title: BRIEF-Newstrike Resources Unit, Licensed Producer Of Cannabis Received Producer's Licence To Cultivate In Greenhouse Site In Niagara Region​
text:
Market News April 2, 2018 / 12:49 PM / a few seconds ago BRIEF-Newstrike Resources Unit, Licensed Producer Of Cannabis Received Producer's Licence To Cultivate In Greenhouse Site In Niagara Region​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 2 (Reuters) - Newstrike Resources Ltd: 
* UNIT, LICENSED PRODUCER OF CANNABIS RECEIVED PRODUCER’S LICENCE TO CULTIVATE IN GREENHOUSE SITE IN NIAGARA REGION​ 
* YEARS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
